title: Rebirth of The Arrogant Evil Doctor - Novel Updates
tags: Confident Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Medical Knowledge   Modern Day   Power Couple   Reverse Harem   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration
author: 紫雨漪漪
description:
She is the world’s most famous evil doctor.

The silver needle in one hand is superb, it is not only a tool to save people, but also a weapon to kill.

When she wakes up again after being victimized by a conspiracy, she is no longer her.

“Let’s divorce!” The man mercilessly threw the divorce papers at her.

She took it and smiled coldly, because at this moment Xia Yanxuan no longer exists, inside her is a ghost, her name is Liu Qinxi.

She thought that she was just a woman abandoned by her husband.

But when an odd necklace identical to the one she owns in her previous life that possesses supernatural powers appears.

Waves of powerful and mysterious forces keep coming to her.

Everything seems to have become less calm.

There’s a saying that if you do not become great in adversity, you will die in adversity.

People with little insight know that it is better to offend the villain than provoke an evil doctor.

In response, she just smiled coldly.

Those who insulted me will die mercilessly. I will not hesitate to break their bones!

But, but –

The more powerful she is, the more men chase behind her.>
